metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7164 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
SQLAlchemy through 1.2.17 and 1.3.x through 1.3.0b2 allows SQL Injectionvia the order_by parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-sqlalchemy - 1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1
python3-sqlalchemy-ext - 1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlalchemy package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.18+ds1-2ubuntu1').
